title: Warped
description: The Hunt Is On. Will Edge Find The Woman He Wronged? Will He Be Too Late?PRAISE FOR WARPEDABSOLUTELY AMAZING. A THRILLING, SUSPENSEFUL READ. Oh, Emma James, you tore apart my heart in WRENCHED and now you have blown apart my mind with WARPED. Never have I read a series that has had the ability to twist and turn my heart and mind in all directions...~Reading Is Our Satisfaction - Maria AlexanderWarped. Man, what a crazy ride this book is. I enjoy all of the authors work, but Warped really blew me away. This book had me on the edge of my seat the entire time. I was just wanting to get through it as quickly as possible because I need to see what happens but also wanted to savor it and make it last longer. It was so good. Emma really created a wonderfully twisted world that I can't get enough of! I am eager for more.~Jen In BooklandWHISPERI was never meant to be free.Evil has taken from me again.I’ve lost the two people I’ve grown to love because another of Hell’s bastards has staked his claim on me and stolen me away.What gives another human being the right to take another’s innocence and try to destroy their soul?EDGEWe were never meant to meet.Our lives collided and spun out in different directions.Now it’s a race against time.Time she doesn’t have.This is on my head.I messed up.What happens when a Soulless Bastard MC enforcer is on the hunt for the those involved in taking the sweet and wild girl?No Mercy happens.Content for mature aged readers 18 +.
author: Emma   James
